snippet: A judge in Atlanta set bond at $100,000 for Chamique Holdsclaw, a former W.N.B.A. star and Olympic gold medalist, who was in jail on assault and weapons charges.
abstract: Atlanta judge sets $100,000 bond for former WNBA star Chamique Holdsclaw, who was arrested on assault and weapons charges; Holdsclaw is accused of firing shots into car belonging to Tulsa Shock forward Jennifer Lacy.
lead_paragraph: A judge in Atlanta set bond at $100,000 for Chamique Holdsclaw, a former W.N.B.A. star and Olympic gold medalist, who was in jail on assault and weapons charges.

headline.seo: Bond Set at $100,000 for Chamique Holdsclaw
